TestSuit.Name: Device Managment

Parameters.Name: DEVICE-2-1-31 SET NETWORK DEFAULT GATEWAY CONFIGURATION - IPV6

Test.TestName: SET NETWORK DEFAULT GATEWAY CONFIGURATION - IPV6
Test.Name: Correct response: several IPv6 and IPv4 in initial get 1
Test.Description: Several IPv6 and IPv4 in initial get Annex A.15: NetworkInterface.IPv4.DHCP = Off Annex A.15: IPv6.FromDHCP.Address is set

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DEVICE-2-1-31 SET NETWORK DEFAULT GATEWAY CONFIGURATION - IPV6
STEP 1 - Get Network Default Gateway Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Check if original network default configuration returned STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Get network interfaces Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Check that the DUT returned current interfaces STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Set Network Default Gateway Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Get Network Default Gateway Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - Check if IP address 2001:1:1:1:1:1:1:1 is present in the list STEP PASSED
STEP 8 - Set Network Default Gateway Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
TEST PASSED
